se.idsec.signservice.security.certificate.CertificateValidator

  • Packages that use CertificateValidator 
    Package Description
    se.idsec.signservice.security.certificate.impl
    Implementations for X.509 support.
    se.idsec.signservice.security.sign
    Interfaces and classes for signing.

    • Uses of CertificateValidator in se.idsec.signservice.security.certificate.impl

      Classes in se.idsec.signservice.security.certificate.impl that implement CertificateValidator 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  SimpleCertificateValidator
      A simple validator that does not perform revocation checking and only relies upon the supplied certificates when building the chain.

    • Uses of CertificateValidator in se.idsec.signservice.security.sign

      Methods in se.idsec.signservice.security.sign that return CertificateValidator 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CertificateValidator SignatureValidator.getCertificateValidator()
      Gets the certificate validator instance that is to be used to validate the signer certificate up until a trusted path.
